stories.title: Manufacturing Pilot
stories.description: Found $AUD 600,000/year in hidden material leakage costs during our Health Check.
stories.content:
A mid-sized manufacturing client was struggling with inventory management. They knew there were inefficiencies but couldn't pinpoint them in their scattered data.

Our Data Health Check connected their procurement, production, and waste management systems. We deployed a unified data model to track material flow from entry to exit.

We identified a consistent material leakage issue in one of their production lines, amounting to nearly $AUD 600,000 in annual losses. We built a simple, real-time dashboard to monitor this variance, allowing them to fix the process and prevent future losses.

stories.title: Real Estate CRM
stories.description: Cleaned & restructured 50k+ contacts for a fully automated marketing pipeline.
stories.content:
A real estate agency had over 50,000 contacts in a messy, inconsistent CRM, making targeted marketing impossible and leading to missed opportunities.

We undertook a massive data cleaning and restructuring project. We standardized formats, removed thousands of duplicates, and enriched the data with property preferences and historical engagement data.

The result was a clean, segmented database that powered a new automated marketing pipeline, increasing lead qualification rates by 40% and boosting agent productivity.

stories.title: SME Finance Team
stories.description: Replaced 20+ spreadsheets with one simple, powerful Data App.
stories.content:
The finance team at a growing SME was drowning in over 20 different spreadsheets for financial reporting. The process was manual, error-prone, and took days each month, delaying critical financial insights.

We developed a centralized Data App that connected directly to their accounting software and other financial data sources. It automated all their standard reports—P&L, cash flow, and departmental budgets—into a single, interactive dashboard.

This reduced their monthly reporting time by 90% and completely eliminated manual data entry errors, freeing the team to focus on strategic financial analysis instead of data wrangling.

stories.title: E-commerce Analytics
stories.description: Boosted online sales by 25% with a custom sales and marketing dashboard.
stories.content:
An e-commerce startup was struggling to understand customer behavior and marketing ROI. Their data was siloed in Shopify, Google Analytics, and social media platforms, making a unified view impossible.

We built a custom analytics dashboard that integrated all their key data sources. The dashboard provided a clear view of the complete customer journey, top-performing products, and marketing channel effectiveness.

With these new insights, they were able to optimize their ad spend and personalize promotions, leading to a 25% increase in sales within the first quarter and a significant improvement in marketing ROI.
